report.title: App - Get Plot For User
report.description: List of plots of a given user ID. Used by Karolis to setup app. Report contains IDs hard-coded to live Warehouse.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations square LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=square.id AND lw.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id=square.id AND plot.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms cache_ttPlotType on cache_ttPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_attribute_id=118 AND lav.location_id=plot.id JOIN users u on u.id=#current_user_id# JOIN person_attribute_values pavOthers on pavOthers.int_value=square.id AND pavOthers.person_attribute_id=2 AND pavOthers.deleted=false LEFT JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value=square.id AND pav.person_id=u.person_id AND pav.person_attribute_id=2 AND pav.deleted=false WHERE square.location_type_id=4009 AND lw.website_id = 32 AND square.deleted=false AND pav.updated_by_id != u.id #filters# GROUP BY square.id,lav.text_value,plot.id,plot.created_by_id,pav.updated_by_id,u.id,cache_ttPlotType.term HAVING (plot.created_by_id=#current_user_id# OR count(distinct pavOthers.id) < 2)

param.name: current_user_id
param.display: Id of the currently logged in user

column.name: plot_name
column.sql: case when lav.text_value IS null then 'Plot at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| cache_ttPlotType.term || ') ' else 'Plot ' || lav.text_value || ' at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| cache_ttPlotType.term || ') ' end
